$Id$

                      Fedora Directory Ingest Service
                      ===============================

This directory contains the diringest webapp and a standalone utility
for SIP to FOXML conversion, called sip2fox.

Installation and Use:
---------------------

  For all documentation, see doc/index.html


Distribution Contents:
----------------------

  README.txt             This document
  diringest.war          The Directory Ingest webapp
  doc/                   Documentation for diringest and sip2fox
  sip2fox/               Utility for standalone conversion / testing
    sip2fox              Unix shell script for invoking sip2fox
    sip2fox.bat          Windows batch file for invoking sip2fox
    config/              Configuration files for sip2fox
    lib/                 JAR files required for sip2fox
    samples/             Sample SIPs for use with sip2fox or diringest
